title: watchOS 8.5 RC version now available to developers, features new American Siri voice
content:
After previewing five test versions, Apple is finally seeding watchOS 8.5 RC ahead of the final release next week. Here’s what is new with the upcoming Apple Watch software.

more…

The post watchOS 8.5 RC version now available to developers, features new American Siri voice appeared first on 9to5Mac.
